Table of Contents

Name

snaptime - copy an N-body snapshot with a new time

Synopsis

snaptime [parameter=value]

Description

Copies snapshot(s) while resetting time. It will warn if more than one snapshot is found. Use snapcopy(1NEMO) if selections on time are needed.

If no output file is given, it will report all the input times of the snapshots that have particle data.

Parameters

The following parameters are recognized in any order if the keyword is also given:
in=snap_file
Input snapshot [???]
out=snap_file
Output snapshot [???]
time=
Time to set [0.0]

See Also

snapcopy(1NEMO) , snapmask(1NEMO)

Files

NEMO/src/nbody/trans/snaptime.c

Author

Peter Teuben

Update History

20-feb-2020    V0.2 add option to leave out= blank to report times    PJT
